description:
On a flight back to his hometown , to attend the marriage of his mother, Molly meets his childhood friend Josh . Desperate, she finds comfort in his friend's shoulder after finishing , just before boarding , with the " mystery man " it would take to meet the family . So Josh thinks this is the ideal opportunity : after all , his father is suffering from a fatal disease and just express a desire to meet the woman who will one day become his daughter . On the phone , Josh ends up having Molly as his future bride - without her knowing it. The girl is furious . When the couple lands , however , seems to be too late to undo the mistake. The families of both are in an uproar . And the confusion is definitely armed .
